title: Left click working weird in game
body:
First, I tested my MB1 and it is working just fine. and here is the issue i am having in game.
It takes several left click to finalize an action, say...
1) attack move, pressing A (works fine, range shows), left click didnt finalize, second left click didnt finalize, third left click . action completed.
2) smart ping, pressing G (works fine, cursor changes), left click didnt finalize, second left click . action completed.
I really dont know whats going on with my setting? or client? or what. I just encountered the problem today, last game and being looking for ways to solve it.
so far i have tried...
1) delete files in config folder...
2) hextech repair...
still not working.

Need some help here!!!

replies.body:
You may have a corrupt configuration, which isn't really common but it can happen especially if modifications are made.  You took some good steps but not to completion- for example, you'll want to delete your entire config folder to reset your config.  Doing this may resolve the issue:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

You should also try another mouse to rule out hardware possibilities as well.  I hope that helps!
